description:
A lot of things in the python universe are named after Month Python
references - references that we python programmers may not understand,
and may not even be able to spot as jokes. I have collected some of
these and will share them with you, for your edification and amusement.

sa friend Bio
-------------

sa friend is a designer and developer currently studying at Recurse
Center in NYC. Before that, she was the senior designer and production
director at Guild Eyewear, a start up making mass-customizable glasses.
She is also the founder of Small Talk, an Interdisciplinary Lecture
Series.
title: Monty Python for pythonistas
